name: Knock in-app feed notifications kit
description:
Get notified üéâ

Knock's in-app feed notification kit provides components for adding delightful in-app notifications to your product.


The Knock in-app feed component supports:

  • Mark as read
  • Filtering
  • Dark mode theme


We also have an open-source React library if you want to use this component in your frontend.


Suggestions or questions? Give us a shout @knocklabs on Twitter.
